opinion.caption: W. W. WOOLLEY PONTOTOC COUNTY SOIL AND WATER CONSERVATION DISTRICT
opinion.opinion_text: OPINION — AG — THE EASEMENT TO WHICH YOU REFER IS STILL VALID AS TO THE POTOTOC COUNTY SOIL AND WATER CONSERVATION DISTRICT. CITE: 82 O.S. 1961 531 [82-531], 2 O.S. 1961 813.1 [2-813.1], 2 O.S. 1961 801 [2-801], 82 O.S. 1961 565 [82-565] (CHARLES OWENS)
